form.label: darkfalcon_tactic_control_link_tomorrow
form.description: Used for linking security controls to tactics in the tomorrow modeling tool

search.query:
| inputlookup df_tactic_control_map_tomorrow.csv | append [ stats count | eval TacticID = "$input_tactic_id$" | eval df_control_id= "$input_control_id$" | eval temp_dt = now() | eval DateAdded = strftime(now(), "%Y-%m-%d") | fields - _raw _time count | table * | join type=outer [ |rest /services/authentication/current-context/context | fields username| where username!="splunk-system-user" | rename username AS Contact]]
| sort -temp_dt | dedup TacticID df_control_id | fields - temp_dt | sort - DateAdded
| eval mode = "$input_mode$" | eval delete=if(mode="delete" and TacticID="$input_tactic_id$" and df_control_id="$input_control_id$", "yes", "no") | where delete="no" | fields - delete mode
| outputlookup df_tactic_control_map_tomorrow.csv

| inputlookup df_tactic_control_map_tomorrow.csv
| join type=left TacticID[ | inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv | fields TacticID Tactic]
| join type=left df_control_id[ | inputlookup df_control_detail.csv | fields df_control_id control_vendor control_name]
| table TacticID Tactic df_control_id control_name control_vendor DateAdded Contact
| eval epoch1=strptime(DateAdded, "%Y-%m-%d") | sort - epoch1 | fields - epoch1
